title: Normal Draft pick in OCE
body: I understand that other regions have this and I really like the idea of it as u can practice how to play ranked etc without hindering your placements.just think this should be in Oce

replies.body: For the love of god Riot we have wanted this for years now, please just add the queue if queue times are too long or people hate it, then just remove it and try again in a few years.

Talk em into it pal.

I'm doing all I can! XD 

Draft Pick and more transparency are 2 things that I mention often to OCE **Riot**. It's really tricky though because it's not just one "big boss man" holding all these things back, it's several teams over at **Riot** who seem a little bit distanced from the community.

I believe in your power :^)

While I want this, there is always the counter argument.

Will the timers be too high that no one will play?
Will players sit in the high timer queues and do nothing, therefore sacrificing the other queue timers?
Or will it bring more players into and back into the game given that there are more options?

It's the same argument as to having a permanent TT, or a Ranked TT, or even bring back The Crystal Scar, will it improve, or diminish the already low player base in OCE?

I honestly think they should just have normal draft instead of blind pick.
Seriously, I moved to the UK and it's a much more fun and oragnise game.
And you don't get so many people trying to go the same lane; especially with the new picker. it's amazing.

I agree with this, I am a NA player and I am used to all the perks of having Riot give it's attention to a more active region.  It seems from what I've been experiencing from playing on the OCE side and talking to League of Legends fans, there isn't a large enough community in this region.  This can be due to the lack of transparency RIOT has in Australia, the smaller population of the area as opposed to the other highly populated ones.  I have to do more research on the community in Australia and see what kind of events are made for League fans and what kind of methods RIOT uses to promote League of Legends.  On another note, there have also been numerous amount of Bots on the OCE server playing in CO-OP vs AI games, which I've never seen on NA.  This made it very frustrating to play and I can see how it would effect the overall gameplay for new comers.

This needs to be back, you should make it before a new level 30 can play ranked they have to have played atleast 10 games of normal draft mode.
Also if you make this available for people that are level 20 + it will really help lower levels understand the pick and ban rate and how to prepare for ranked. {{champion:79}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}  PLS RITO
